headline: Scan and secure Atlassian with Cloudflare CASB
keywords: Security Week, CASB, Cloudflare Zero Trust, Product News, Atlassian, SaaS, Security
description: Cloudflare CASB can now integrate and scan Atlassian products, Confluence and Jira, for critical security issues, like misconfigurations, data exposure, and third-party app risks. Start scanning in just a few clicks!
